title: Riot staff: 1000 Classic wins
body: As I have officially achieved 999 wins in the classic game mode and was wondering who, possibly a riot member, would like to play my 1000th win with me?

replies.body: 750 Hours (approximated by 45min (average game length) x1000(wins)=45000minutes/60=750) is about 31 Days. With these estimates I believe it is safe to say that 1000 wins is a celebration of a month of victory.
